import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal" import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form" import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Badge from 'react-bootstrap/Badge'; import { FaPlusCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import './modalStyle.css' export default function ModalPizzas(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false) const handleShow = () => setShow(true) return( <> Escolha o sabor da pizza:

Quantidade de sabores na pizza:

 Escolha sua pizza Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa Pizza de Calabresa ) }
